itemListElement.name: Split Mung Bean Soup – Mom’s Simple Mung Dal Recipe with Garlic Chili Tadka. Vegan Glutenfree

@graph.name: Split Mung Bean Soup - Mom's Simple Mung Dal Recipe with Garlic Chili Tadka.
@graph.description: Mom's Simple Moong Dal is spiced only with green chilies and garlic and makes for a light weeknight soup. Vegan Dal Dahl Daal Recipe with yellow Lentils. Serves 2 to 3
recipeIngredient: 1 cup dry Moong bean (Mung Dal / petite yellow lentils)
3 cups water (3.5 cups for thinner consistency)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and soak the Mung Dal for an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash and soak the Mung Dal for an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: In a deep pan, add the drained dal and 3 cups water, salt and turmeric. Cover and cook on low-medium heat until dal mashes easily. 20-25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a deep pan, add the drained dal and 3 cups water, salt and turmeric. Cover and cook on low-medium heat until dal mashes easily. 20-25 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Or pressure cook on medium for 1 whistle ( 5 minutes at high pressure). Let the pressure release on its own as it cools slightly. The dal in the pictures is pressure cooked hence well mashed.
recipeInstructions.name: Or pressure cook on medium for 1 whistle ( 5 minutes at high pressure). Let the pressure release on its own as it cools slightly. The dal in the pictures is pressure cooked hence well mashed.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the beans are cooked, In a small(tiny) pan, add the oil and heat on medium-high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the beans are cooked, In a small(tiny) pan, add the oil and heat on medium-high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mustard seeds and let them start to sputter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mustard seeds and let them start to sputter.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the garlic, chili and asafetida-hing.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the garlic, chili and asafetida-hing.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook until the garlic and chili have brown edges.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook until the garlic and chili have brown edges.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop this tadka into the cooked dal, mix lightly, and serve hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop this tadka into the cooked dal, mix lightly, and serve hot.
